Idk why they have trick2g on here he is such a asshole in all of his streams just rude asf. plus he doesn't seem that good just that his team carries him

signed in just to reply to this comment.

Trick2G may have his moments were he rages. but that man has put in more time and effort into charity streams then most any streamers i have seen in a LONG time. his stream to help out animals was big because of how much time and effort and care he put into it to help richmonds SPCA. Doesnt help to mention all of his other charity work streaming which has brought good money to the causes he had done. https://trick2g.org/charity-work/ {{sticker:sg-ahri-2}}

To add, he does the Toys for Tots every Christmas. Trick's been one of or if not the biggest contributor donating and helping people in the League community. He's been preaching D breach for years. Well qualified to be here. OPEN D GATES

I don't really see the point in not mass producing these (without the signatures of course) and giving those proceeds to the charity you want to support. The way it is now, you're gonna make less money, and the vast majority of people who want to support charity (and rep Riot), apart from FOUR PEOPLE, just don't get to. Seems incredibly inefficient to me ://
